item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Avenue N, located in East Providence (Rumford area) in the Rumford Center complex

Okay, I admit it. Uncharacteristically I've been here twice and really like it. Not that I don't like places, but that I've been here twice BEFORE making it an official MNM. Avenue N has great food and drinks, and is always a little crowded which is why I've hesitated. However, the last time I was here I spoke with the owner/chef and he assured me that on Mondays the bar is mostly open. SO here we go, its time to share!

Avenue N is one of the only bistro restaurants in Rumford. As a matter of fact it probably IS the only one which is why its so popular. It has a great contemporary bistro atmosphere and a large marble bar which is perfect for the MNM. The food is diverse so there is something for every palette, and truthfully, I LOVE the Bourbon Hayride cocktail. Also Chef Nick Rabar is  host of “Chef 2 Go" on the Cox network, which you may have seen as you've perused the channels. Its a great show that highlights local restaurants and fresh food suppliers. If you've been already, then you know, and if you haven't, then here's your chance and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Avenue N!!!!!
